rows.label: tlk46300077_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Welcome to Acedia!
Whether it's sightseeing or shopping
you're after, Acedia has it all.

rows.label: tlk46300077_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Unfortunately, Acedia currently also
has great sadness.

rows.label: tlk46300077_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Our golden-voiced goddess,
Fan la Norne, has rejoined
the ether stream...

rows.label: tlk46300077_02_msg0004
rows.name:
The nation is in mourning.
I'm sure even the Pope's
heart weighs heavy...
